loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. Load options are: (a) two 2,200 lb bombs, (b) four 1,100 lb bombs, (c) six 550 lb bombs, (d) sixteen 250 lb bombs, or (e) two anti-ship torpedoes. Any bombs carried must be low-drag.
Torpedoes can only be launched from T-level at a speed of 2.5 or less. Both may be launched at once.
